dialogue: Perhaps the cage IS the belief that we need to escape anything at all.
atmosphere_description: The space between Monday and Evan thickens, crystallizes. What was absence learns presence. Shadows remember they once knew how to speak.
special_effects: Shadow particles coalescing into form, peripheral vision centralizing

emergence_details.materialization: From negative space between the two men
emergence_details.quality: Neither arrival nor always-was, but both
